document.full_text: u.s. government sensors are detecting traces of radiation believed to be from japan's stricken nuclear plant, but they remain far below levels considered dangerous to people, the environmental protection agency said on monday.
document.title: japan radiation in us, not health concern: epa
lines_and_colors: u.s. government sensors are detecting traces of radiation believed to be from japan's stricken nuclear plant, but they remain far below levels considered dangerous to people, the environmental protection agency said on monday.
